meanings.sent1: Her disloyalty to the team cost them the game.
meanings.sent2: The king was hurt by the disloyalty of his advisor.
meanings.sent3: The disloyalty of the cat to its owner was evident when it snuck off to the neighbor's house.
meanings.sent4: The disloyalty of the storm to the sunny weather was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The disloyalty of the student to the school rules was met with consequences.

meanings.sent1: The disloyalty of the spy led to the downfall of the mission.
meanings.sent2: The disloyalty of the knight to his kingdom shocked everyone.
meanings.sent3: The disloyalty of the squirrel to its fellow squirrels was revealed when it stole all the nuts.
meanings.sent4: The disloyalty of the wind to the kite caused it to crash into a tree.
meanings.sent5: The disloyalty of the employee to the company was discovered through leaked information.
